comment:
/**
 * ---
 * category: utilities
 * ---
 * Converts a CSS unit value combination into an array of type [ value, unit ]
 *
 * @module parseUnit
 *
 * Example inputs:
 *  - '100px'
 *  - '20rem'
 *  - '10vh'
 *  - '400vmin'
 *
 * @param {string|number} str
 * @returns {Array} Returns array of shape [ value, unit ] Unit is '' if it could
 * not be parsed
 */
description: Converts a CSS unit value combination into an array of type [ value, unit ]
name:
parseUnit

Example inputs:
 - '100px'
 - '20rem'
 - '10vh'
 - '400vmin'

returns.description:
Returns array of shape [ value, unit ] Unit is '' if it could
not be parsed

title: parseUnit
